speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with John?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is John. How can I help you?

speaker: Agent
text: I need to verify your identity before we proceed. Can you give me your date of birth or address?

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, thanks. Now, you’ve got an overdue balance of $500. What the hell are you going to do about it?

speaker: Customer
text: I’m working on it and plan to make a payment soon.

speaker: Agent
text: You say that every damn time! What’s stopping you from sorting this out now?

speaker: Customer
text: I understand your frustration, but I assure you I'm doing my best.

speaker: Agent
text: Yeah, right! Spare me the excuses! You’re just wasting time here!

speaker: Customer
text: I would appreciate it if we could keep this professional.

speaker: Agent
text: Professional? You think I’m playing games? Get your shit together!

speaker: Customer
text: I will make sure to pay what I owe. Thank you for your time.

speaker: Agent
text: Whatever, just make sure you do it or I’ll be back on your ass!
